2.0.name: wordpress/responsive-slides
2.0.description:
Responsive Slideshow Plugin

Based upon Responsive Slides ( http://responsive-slides.viljamis.com/ )

Looking for a simple and fast slideshow ? Well, here it is :) . Watch the video tutorial :)

Feel free to ask for any modifications :) and support :) sosresponsiveslidesplugin@gmail.com

Video Tutorial: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h1e4FULbLa4
